high_descs: Turn left and move past the shower stall then turn right at the end of the room and face the vanity.
Pick up the spray bottle to the left of the sink from the corner of the vanity.
Turn right and move past the sink, then turn right and move towards the toilet.
Place the spray bottle on top of the toilet cistern near the handle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a spray bottle on top of a toilet cistern.

high_descs: Turn to your left and head to the sink.
Pick up the spray bottle on the counter.
Move to the toilet.
Place the spray bottle on the back of the toilet to the left of the items that are on there.
tasks.task_desc: Put the spray bottle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the counter left of the sink.
Pick up the spray bottle from the counter.
Bring the spray bottle to the toilet.
Put the spray bottle on the toilet tank lid.
tasks.task_desc: Put a spray bottle on the toilet tank lid.

high_descs: Turn left, head to the wall, turn left, head to the toilet.
Pick up the soap on the toilet.
Turn around and bring the soap to the sink.
Wet the soap in the sink with water.
Bring the wet soap to the left cabinet under the sink.
Put the wet soap in the left cabinet under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet soap in the left cabinet under the sink.

high_descs: Go left and then left again to face the toilet.
Pick the soap up from the back of the toilet.
Turn around and go to stand in front of the sink.
Put the soap in the sink, turn the water on and then off, and the pick the soap back up.
Go left to left side of the sink.
Open the bottom, left cabinet and put the soap in and shut the door.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn left, then go forward, then turn left again to face the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap from the back of the toilet.
Turn around and go to the sink.
Watch the bar of soap in the sink.
Turn around, move forward, then turn back around to face the cabinets beneath the sink.
Put the bar of soap in the leftmost cabinet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in the cabinet.

high_descs: Turn left, turn left again and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the pink bar of soap from the toilet tank.
Turn around and look at the sink.
Walk to the sink, put the soap in the sink, turn the water on, turn the water off, get the soap out of the sink.
Turn around, turn back around,
Open the left cupboard door on the vanity, put the soap in the cupboard.
tasks.task_desc: Retrieve the bar of soap, put the soap in the vanity cupboard.

high_descs: Turn right and cross the room then turn right and face the sink
Open the left cabinet under the sink and pick up the bar of soap then close the cabinet
Turn left and take a step forward the turn right and face the sink
Place the soap in the sink and turn on the faucet. Turn off the faucet and pick up the soap
turn around and take a step forward, then turn back around and face the sink
Open the left hand cabinet under the sink and place the soap to the right of the crumpled up paper.
tasks.task_desc: Place wet soap in a cabinet

high_descs: Turn right and go to the right side of the sink.
Take a bar of soap from the second under-sink cabinet from the right.
Take the soap to the sink.
Wash the bar of soap in the sink.
Go to the farthest left cabinet under the sink.
Put the bar of soap in the cabinet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a rinsed bar of soap in a bathroom cabinet.

high_descs: Turn right and go to the sink.
Take out the bar of soap from the middle cabinet, beneath the sink.
Go to the sink, to your left.
Wash the bar of soap in the sink.
Turn around, move forward, then turn around again to view the cabinets under the sink
Put the bar of soap in the left most cabinet, under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in the cabinet.

high_descs: Move to the sink the right of the toilet
Pick up soap from the cabinet
Move to the sink to the right of you
Wet the soap in the sink
Move to the front of the sink ahead of you
Put the soap in the cabinet under the sink to the left
tasks.task_desc: Put a bar of wet soap in the cabinet under the sink to the left.

high_descs: Turn to your right and walk across the room to the sink on your right.
Open the first cupboard door, to the right of the sink and remove the pink bar of soap.
Move to your left so that you are directly in front of the sink.
Place the pink bar of soap in the sink, turn the water on, get the soap wet, turn the water off, then remove the bar of soap.
Step back from the sink.
Place the pink bar of soap in the first cupboard, all the way to the left, and under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Place the wet bar of soap in the cupboard all the way to the left, under the sink.

high_descs: Go right and turn to the right to face the sink.
Open the cabinet below the sink and take the soap out.
Move to the left and face the sink.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the soap up.
Move to the left side of the sink.
Open the bottom left cabinet and put the bar of soap in the cabinet and shut the door.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in the cabinet.

high_descs: Turn around and walk over to the bathroom sink
Open the cabinet directly below the sink and pick up the bar of soap
Look up and put the soap bar in the sink
Rinse the soap under running water in the sink and remove it
Walk a few feet away from the sink then turn back toward it
Open the bottom left cabinet cabinet and put the soap bar in it
tasks.task_desc: Put the cleaned soap bar in the cabinet

high_descs: turn right and walk to the shower, then turn right and walk to the sink at the end of the room on the right
grab a bar of soup of the cabinet beneath the sink
look up at the sink
place the bar of soap in the sink and rinse it off
turn around and walk to the toilet straight ahead, then turn around to face the sink
place the bar of soap in the bottom left cabinet
tasks.task_desc: place a bar of soap in the cabinet to the bottom left of the sink

high_descs: Turn around and head to the sink.
Open the drawer under the sink and pick up the soap in there.
Bring the soap up to the sink.
Put the soap in the sink and get it wet with water.
Pick up the soap and bring it to the cabinet below the sink to the left.
Put the soap in that cabinet on the left.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet soap in the left cabinet.

high_descs: Move to the left side of the sink where the counter top is
Pick up the yellow tube sitting on top of the counter top to the left of the sink
Move to the middle cabinet directly under the sink
Open the middle cupboard, place yellow tube in the cupboard then shut the cupboard
tasks.task_desc: Place a yellow tube in the cupboard

high_descs: turn around, walk to wall, turn right to face the sink
pick up the candle that is on the counter
turn around, turn back to face sink
put the candle in the cabinet under the sink
tasks.task_desc: put the candle from the counter in to the cabinet under the sink

high_descs: Turn around and face the sink on the left.
Pick the candle up from the counter.
Turn and move to the right to face the cabinet below the sink.
Put the candle in the middle cabinet under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle in a cabinet.

high_descs: Walk straight to the wall, turn left to face the toilet.
Take the candle on top of the toilet.
Turn around to face the cabinet.
Open the cabinet, place the candle into the cabinet and close the cabinet door.
tasks.task_desc: Place a candle in the cabinet.

high_descs: Move to the right of the toilet to the right of the shower
pick up a candle from the toilet
move to the sink behind you
put the candle in a cabinet under the sink
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle in a cabinet under the sink.

high_descs: Walk forward then turn left to face the toilet
Pick up the candle from the top of the toilet
Turn around and walk up to the bathroom counter
Open the cabinet directly under the sink and put the candle in it
tasks.task_desc: Put the candle in the bathroom cabinet

high_descs: Turn around and go to the toilet.
Pick up the candle from the back of the toilet.
Turn around to face the sink.
Open the cabinet on the far let and put the candle inside.
tasks.task_desc: Put the candle in the cabinet on the far let.

high_descs: Move to the toilet to the right of the shower
Pick up a candle from the back of the toilet
Move to the sink behind you
Put the candle in the cabinet to the left of the sink
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle in the cabinet to the left of the sink

high_descs: Turn around and walk straight and then turn left to face the toilet
Pick up the yellow candle stick from the toilet lid
Turn around and face the bathroom counter with a sink
Open the bottom left cabinet door and place the candle inside then close the door
tasks.task_desc: Move a candle from the toilet to the cabinet

high_descs: Walk up to the counter in front of you.
Pick up the candlestick that is behind the one closest to you.
Turn around and head over to the toilet.
Place the candlestick on the back of the toilet to the left of the other items.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candlestick to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the counter left of the sink.
Pick up the candle that is far from the edge.
Turn right, move to the toilet.
Place the candle on top of the toilet tank lid.
tasks.task_desc: Place a candle onto the toilet.

high_descs: look on the table
grab the candle on the table
turn right, walk to the toilet on the right
put the candle on the toilet
tasks.task_desc: move the candle from the table to the toilet

high_descs: turn right, walk to the sink on the right
grab the candle on the sink
turn around, walk to the toilet
put the candle on the toilet
tasks.task_desc: grab the candle from the sink, put it on the toilet

high_descs: Move to the sink to the right of you
Pick up candle from the counter
Move to the toilet behind you
Place candle on the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn to your right then face the  sink on your right
Pick up the candle on the sink counter
Turn to your right then face the toilet tank
Put the candle on the  left side edge of the tank
tasks.task_desc: Put the candle on the top of the tank

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the counter on the right side of the sink.
Pick up the yellow candle from the counter.
Face the opposite direction and go over near the left side of the toilet.
Set the candle on the left side of the toilet tank cover.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: turn to the right and face the counter top to the right of the sink
pick up the yellow candle
turn left and walk over to the toilet
put the candle on top of the toilet to the left of the soap dispenser
tasks.task_desc: pick up the yellow candle and put it on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Turn and go to the counter next to the sink.
Pick up the candle next to the cloth on the counter.
Turn around and go to the toilet.
Set the candle on the toilet to the left of the lotion.
tasks.task_desc: Set a candle on the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the left to face the counter top to the right of the sink.
Pick the pink soap up from off of the counter.
Move to the left to face the sink.
Place the soap in the sink, run some water, and pick up the soap.
Move to the right to face the end of the counter top.
Place the soap on the end of the counter top.
tasks.task_desc: Place the wet soap on the end of the counter top.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the sink on your right.
Pick up the bar of soap to the right of the spray bottle on the counter.
Go to the sink ahead of you.
Place the bar of soap in the sink, turn the water on, rinse off the bar of soap, turn the water off, and remove the bar of soap from the sink.
Turn to your right and go around the counter so that you are facing the sink from the end of the counter.
Place the bar of soap back on the counter, near the edge.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap on the counter.

high_descs: Turn left and take a step to your left.
Pick up the pink bar of soap that's in front of you.
Take a step left to stand in front of the sink,
Get the soap wet in the sink and then pick it back up and shut off the water.
Turn right and walk past the counter then turn left and walk to the wall then turn left to face the length of the counter.
Put the soap on the counter to the right of the candle.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet bar of soap on the counter.

high_descs: Face the right side of the bathroom counter
Open the door on the far right under the sink and take out a pink bar of soap
Move left to the sink
Put the soap in the sink and turn on the water. Then turn the water off and remove the soap.
Turn right and go to the far right side of the counter
Place the soap near the edge of the counter in front of the other bar of soap
tasks.task_desc: Wash a bar of soap and put it on the bathroom counter

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the vanity with the sink on the right.
Open the lower right cabinet under the vanity, pick up the bar of soap from inside and close the door.
Turn left and walk to the sink on the vanity on the right.
Put the bar of soap inside the sink, rinse it for a few seconds and pick it back up.
Turn right and walk to the side of the vanity counter on the left.
Put the rinsed bar of soap near the edge of the counter in front of the yellow soap bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of soap on a counter.

high_descs: Turn to face the counter to the right of the sink.
Open the lower cabinet on the far right, below the sink and pick up the soap.
Move to the left to face the sink.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the soap up again.
Go right and then left and turn to face the end of the counter to the right of the sink.
Put the soap on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean soap on the counter.

high_descs: Turn left, turn right at the shower, turn right to face the counter to the left of the sink.
Pick up the bar of soap from the counter.
Move to the front of the sink.
Put the soap inside of the sink, rinse it off with water, take the soap out of the sink.
Walk to face the right edge of the sink.
Put the soap down on the edge of the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse off a bar of soap and put it on the counter.

high_descs: Turn left, hang a right at the shower and turn right at the wall to face the vanity.
Pick up the bar of soap on the counter at the far left corner.
Turn right and walk to the sink on the left.
Put the bar of soap inside the sink, rinse it for a few seconds and pick it back up.
Turn right and walk to the side of the vanity on the left.
Put the rinsed bar of soap in front of the right perfume bottle near the edge of the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Place a bar of soap on a counter.

high_descs: Take a big step to your left then walk to the wall in front of you then turn right to face the sink's counter.
Pick up the pink bar of soap that's in front of you.
Take a step to your right to face the sink please.
Get the soap wet in the sink and then pick it back up and shut off the water.
Turn right and walk past the counter on your left then turn left and wlak to the wall then turn left to face the counter.
Put the soap on the counter under the right soap dispenser.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet bar of soap on the counter.

high_descs: Turn to the small floor space between the toilet and the shower.
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll on the floor, underneath the toilet paper dispenser.
Get as close to the back of the toilet as you can.
Place the empty toilet paper roll to the left of the pump bottle, on the back of the toilet.
Turn around and go to the far, left end of the bathroom counter behind you.
Pick up the roll of toilet paper, to the left of the sink, on the counter.
Turn to your right and walk to the end of the sink, then turn to your right and go back to the small space between the shower and the toilet.
Place the toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder, hanging from the wall, to the left of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a new roll of toilet paper on the holder.

high_descs: Turn left and step forward to face the floor to the left of the toilet.
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll on the floor to the left of the toilet.
Look up to face the back of the toilet.
Place the empty toilet paper roll on the back of the toilet.
Turn around and step forward to face the sink.
Pick up the roll of toilet paper on the left side of the sink.
Turn around and step forward to face the back of the toilet.
Place the toilet paper roll on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: To move an empty plus a full toilet paper roll to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Go to the toilet
Pick up the empty toilet roll
Look up at the top of the toilet
Put the empty toilet roll on top of the toilet
Go to the sink
Pick up the full toilet roll
Go to the toilet
Put the full toilet roll on top of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Move a full and an empty toilet roll to the top of the toilet

high_descs: go to the sink in front of you
pick up the brown paper roll
take the roll to the toilet
put the roll on top of the toilet tank
go back to the sink
pick up the roll of toilet paper
take the roll to the toilet
place the roll next to the empty roll on the tank
tasks.task_desc: put an empty roll and a full roll of toilet paper on the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn left then right to face counter with candle and toilet paper.
Pick up candle from counter.
Turn around, proceed to toilet.
Place candle on left side of back of toilet, above the flusher.
Turn around to face counter with toilet paper on it.
Pick up toilet paper from counter.
Turn around, proceed to sink.
Place toilet paper on back of toilet, directly to the right of the candle.
tasks.task_desc: Move candle and toilet paper to back of toilet.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the hand towel that is to the left of the mirror.
Take the hand towel on the hanger off.
With the hand towel in hand go to the toilet.
Place the hand towel on the back of the toilet to the right of the green spray bottle and in front of the bottle of lotion.
Turn and go to the towel that is hanging on the wall to the right of the mirror.
Pick up the towel that is on the towel holder.
With the towel in hand turn around and go to the toilet.
Place the towel behind the green bottle that is on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move the towels to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right and walk forward then turn right and walk up to the left side of the counter
Pick up the furthest pump bottle from the counter
Turn around and walk up to the small trash bin in the corner
Put the pump bottle in the trash bin
Turn around and walk back up to the counter
Pick up the pump bottle from the counter
Turn around and walk up to the small trash bin in the corner
Put the pump bottle in the trash bin
tasks.task_desc: Put the pump bottles in the trash bin

high_descs: Turn around and head to the end of the sink counter on your right.
Pick up the spray bottle sitting on the counter.
Turn around and face the toilet behind you.
Place the spray bottle on top of the toilet's water tank, in front of the dispenser that is already there.
tasks.task_desc: Put a spray bottle on top of the toilet's water tank.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the far edge of the counter on the right.
Pick up the bottle of cleaning spray from the counter.
Turn around and move to the toilet.
Put the bottle of cleaning spray on the top of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Place a bottle of cleaning spray on the top of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around, walk across the room and turn right to face the sink counter when you reach the wall.
Pick up the spray bottle off of the sink counter.
Turn right and begin walking across the room, then hang a right before the shower and walk towards the toilet.
Place the spray bottle on the top of the toilet tank in front of the soap bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a spray bottle on the top of the toilet tank.

high_descs: turn to the left and then turn to the right to move to the counter that is to the right of the sink
pick up the roll of toilet paper from the counter
turn around and move to the left side of the toilet
put the roll of toilet paper on the back of the toilet to the right of the yellow lotion bottle
turn to the left and move forward passed the counter on the left, turning left move the wall and turn left to face the right edge of the counter
pick up the empty toilet paper roll from the counter
turn left, move to the shower, turn right and turn left after passing the shower moving to and facing the left side of the toilet
put the empty toilet paper roll on the back of the toilet to the left of the yellow lotion bottle
tasks.task_desc: put a roll of toilet paper along with an empty toilet paper roll on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the counter on the right.
Pick up the toilet paper from the counter.
Carry the toilet paper and turn around to the toilet.
Place the toilet paper on the tank of the toilet.
Look down and then turn around. Face the sort side of the white counter.
Pick up the empty paper roll from the counter.
Carry the paper roll and turn to the left and then left again back to the toilet.
Place the paper roll on the tank of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move a toilet paper roll and empty roll to the tank of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right towards the sink.
Remove the towel from the towel rack to the left of the mirror.
Turn around and move towards the toilet.
Place the towel on the left side of the toilet tank.
Turn around and move towards the sink.
Remove the towel from the towel rack to the right of the mirror.
Turn around and move towards the toilet.
Place the towel on the right side of the other towel.
tasks.task_desc: The robot needs to get a towel from each towel rack then place them on the toilet tank.
